EXPLAINED

529 PLANS

THE OLD 529

THE NEW 529

PARENTS/FAMILY MEMBERS

Put taxed money into special

529 plans to save for college.

TED CRUZ, R-TEXAS

Added a last-minute amendment to the December 2017 tax overhaul to allow 529 savings to be used for private/religious K-12 education.

TREASURY-BACKED

STATE-SPONSORED

MANAGED BY INVESTMENT COS.

529

SAVINGS GROWS TAX-FREE

Compound interest accrues. 33 states offer state tax deductions or credits as well.

 

529

PARENTS/FAMILY MEMBERS

Take money out to use for college, tax-free, and can use money on K-12 expenses.

PARENTS/FAMILY MEMBERS

Take money out when needed for college, tax-free.

THE NEW 529

TED CRUZ, R-TEXAS

Added a last-minute amendment to the December 2017 tax overhaul to allow 529 savings to be used for private/religious K-12 education.

SAVINGS GROWS TAX-FREE

Compound interest accrues. 33 states offer state tax deductions or credits as well.

 

529

PARENTS/FAMILY MEMBERS

Take money out to use for college, tax-free, and can use money on K-12 expenses.
